TextLibrary.Text: GENERAL TARN
Welcome aboard, young man.
Welcome aboard, young lady.
Thank you for your help, General, but I'm not naive enough to think there are no strings attached.
Thank you for your help, General, but I'm not naive enough to think there are no strings attached.
You will find me hard but fair. This is war. I have a deal to offer you that should benefit us both.
You will find me hard but fair. This is war. I have a deal to offer you that should benefit us both.
Okay...
Okay...
You have experience fighting these... Soulless. We need that. You have Beta Prime. We need that too, but not yet. In return, you need the Trident Military fleet to keep everyone else off your back.
You have experience fighting these... Soulless. We need that. You have Beta Prime. We need that too, but not yet. In return, you need the Trident Military fleet to keep everyone else off your back.
So we help you fight the Soulless and then we turn over Beta Prime.
So we help you fight the Soulless and then we turn over Beta Prime.
Correct, and in return we keep you safe.
Correct, and in return we keep you safe.
And if I say no?
And if I say no?
This is merely the best option for Trident, not the only one. If you say no, we will kill you, take Beta Prime, and move on to another plan.
This is merely the best option for Trident, not the only one. If you say no, we will kill you, take Beta Prime, and move on to another plan.
You're a cold man, General.
You're a cold man, General.
I do what's necessary. Do you?
I do what's necessary. Do you?
I do...
I do...
